normalized: the continent of celtoana.
the land radiated with the mysterious light of many awonder.
countless different races and species called it home.
miraculously, they all coexisted in peace.
even though they were not aware of them,spirits, angels, and demons watched over thepeople as they went about their daily lives.
…when was it that things began to change?
when did the mysterious light thatpulsed through the earth begin to fade?
when did the voices of the spirits grow so faint?
when did the blessings of the angels,and the whispers of the demons, stop reaching the peoples' ears?
perhaps that is what is called'modernization.
there is nothing particularly tragicabout what has happened.
for the world is in a constant state of change.
forgetting the old ways and forgingnew ones is just a reflection of that.
approximately 200 years ago.
the memories of the old world are buried deep in theearth.
they lie underneath the present one, in the form of oil.
its discovery was the spark that ignited the new age.
however, it would soon lead to the flames of war.
the most powerful country lies to the east.
it is known as the fuluakia empire, and it hasbegun to move.
while it boasts the longest known history andholds the most power, its inhabitants today knownot the fear they once held against change.
the fuluakia empire was one step away fromcontrolling the entire continent.
but before that could be achieved, there wasresistance.
at first, it had been only an ember.
but that ember would slowly spread its firethroughout the continent.
to stand against the might of thefuluakia empire, the other countries united.
it did not take long for the alliance to form.
as conflicts continued to be waged,a discovery was made that would changeeverything:
the way to purify and use oil.
the quickest ones to utilize thisdiscovery was the union of guilds,based in the south of the continent.
the guilds, consisting of many differentcraftsmen, began to invent many of themodern techniques of the new age.
approximately 150 years ago
the guilds invented steel tanks of war and otherweapons that were powered by the new technology.
they sold them to the alliance.
the battlefield had changed forever.
even though they were the first of their kind,the tanks, known as draches, posessed immensefirepower.
it only took 10 of them to change history.
the army of fuluakia never stood a chance.
thedestructive power of the tanks was unstoppable.
the fuluakian emperor, upon hearing what hadhappened, announced a new age.
as quickly as mist, the light of magik began to fade.
the waves of the modern age began to spread.
the empire also began buying weapons fromthe guilds, just as the alliance had, and deployedthem on the front lines and along the borders.
the empire and the alliance.
these are the smolderingembers that started the long war of celtoana.
no one could have foreseen the hellfire it became.
a fire that would eventually become the great celtoanawar.
the war has continued these past hundred and fifty orso years.
those who had started it are long since dead,but their hatred lives on.
the war that began the new age appeared as if it wouldnever end,
until 2 individuals entered onto the stage that had been set.
